name: JMG's Poetic Landscape
description:
"Careless Whisper" by George Michael is the first Saxophone song I learned to play in class in middle school, and it is truly a beautiful, peaceful song that is near and dear to me. I love playing the Saxophone and this song reminds me of playing every time I hear it. I picked the instrumental version of the song to use because I want to emphasize the beauty of the Saxophone. The beauty of the music and the beauty of the scene go hand in hand here.

The poem is a Haiku that I created for this assignment.
